anya-e0105n21:1_0: Ācariyabuddhaghoso dasame buddhavassasatake (901-1000-bu-va) dakkhiṇaindiyaraṭṭhe moraṇḍagāme brāhmaṇakule jāto,
anya-e0105n21:1_1: so tīsu vedesu ceva sabbavijjāsippaganthesu ca pāraṅgato hutvā buddhasāsanadhammaṁ sutvā tampi uggaṇhitukāmo
anya-e0105n21:1_2: tasmiṁyeva dakkhiṇaindiyaraṭṭhe ekasmiṁ theravādikavihāre mahāvihāravāsīnaṁ revatattherappamukhānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ
anya-e0105n21:1_4: So evaṁ piṭakattayapāḷimuggaṇhantoyeva aññāsi ‘‘ayamekāyanamaggo dassanavisuddhiyā nibbānasacchikiriyāyā’’ti.
anya-e0105n21:1_5: Ācariyupajjhāyā ca tassa visiṭṭhañāṇappabhāvasampannabhāvaṁ ñatvā ‘‘imassa buddhasāsane kittighoso buddhassa
anya-e0105n21:2_0: So evaṁ piṭakattayapāḷimuggaṇhitvā madarasa nagarasamīpaṭṭhānabhūte mayūradūtapaṭṭanamhi ca kañcipurādīsu
anya-e0105n21:2_1: ca vasanto andhakaṭṭhakathāya paricayaṁ katvā tāya asantuṭṭhacitto sīhaḷaṭṭhakathāsupi paricayaṁ kātukāmo
anya-e0105n21:2_3: Tasmiñca kāle sīhaḷadīpe mahānāmo nāma rājā rajjaṁ kāreti,
anya-e0105n21:2_4: so ca rājā abhayagirivāsīsu pasanno teyeva visesato paggaṇhāti.
anya-e0105n21:3_0: Ekacce pana ādhunikā vicakkhaṇā evaṁ vadanti ‘‘ācariyabuddhaghosassa sīhaḷadīpāgamanena sirimeghavaṇṇarājakālato
anya-e0105n21:3_3: tassa rañño navavassakāle (855-bu-va) buddhassa dāṭhādhātukaliṅgaraṭṭhato sīhaḷadīpamānītā,
anya-e0105n21:3_4: tato paṭṭhāya sīhaḷarājāno anusaṁvaccharaṁ mahantaṁ dhātupūjāussavaṁ karonti.
anya-e0105n21:3_5: Yadi ca ācariyabuddhaghoso tato pacchā sīhaḷadīpamāgaccheyya,
anya-e0105n21:3_6: tampi pāsādikaṁ mahussavaṁ disvā attano ganthesu pakāseyya yathā phāhiyaṁ nāma cinabhikkhu mahānāmarājakāle
anya-e0105n21:3_8: na pana ācariyassa ganthesu taṁpakāsanā dissati,
anya-e0105n21:3_9: tenetaṁ ñāyati ‘‘ācariyabuddhaghoso dāṭhādhātusampattakālato (855-bu-va) puretaraṁyeva sīhaḷadīpamāgantvā aṭṭhakathāyo akāsī’’ti.
anya-e0105n21:3_11: tipiṭakapāḷiyā hi atthasaṁvaṇṇanāya yaṁ vā taṁ vā attano paccakkhadiṭṭhaṁ pakāsetabbaṁ na hoti,
anya-e0105n21:3_14: samantapāsādikāya vinayaṭṭhakathāyaṁ dīpavaṁsatopi kiñci ānetvā pakāsitaṁ,
anya-e0105n21:3_15: dīpavaṁse ca yāva mahāsenarājakālā (819-845-bu-va) pavatti pakāsitāti sirimeghavaṇṇarājakālato (845-873-bu-va)
anya-e0105n21:3_17: Yadi ca aṭṭhakathāyo tato pubbeyeva katā bhaveyyuṁ,
anya-e0105n21:4_0: Ācariyabuddhaghoso pana sīhaḷadīpaṁ pattakāle (965-bu-va) mahāvihārameva gantvā tattha sīhaḷamahātherānaṁ santike sīhaḷaṭṭhakathāyo suṇi.
anya-e0105n21:8_0: Vinayaññussa dhīrassa, sutvā therassa santike’’ti pari. aṭṭha. nigamanakathā.
anya-e0105n21:9_0: Iminā pana aṭṭhakathāvacanena mahāaṭṭhakathādīnaṁ tissannaṁyeva aṭṭhakathānaṁ sutabhāvo dassito.
anya-e0105n21:9_2: kasmā pana tā ācariyena sīhaḷattherānaṁ santike na sutāti?
anya-e0105n21:9_5: Saṅkhepaṭṭhakathā pana mahāpaccariṭṭhakathāya saṁkhittamattabhāvato na sutāti veditabbā.
anya-e0105n21:9_6: Tathā hi vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṁ ganthārambhasaṁvaṇṇanāyaṁ vijira. ṭī.
anya-e0105n21:9_11: samantapāsādikāyañca cūḷapaccarīti nāmaṁ kuhiñcipi na dissati,
anya-e0105n21:9_12: mahāṭṭhakathā mahāpaccarī kurundī andhakasaṅkhepaṭṭhakathāti imāniyeva nāmāni dissanti,
anya-e0105n21:9_13: bahūsu ca ṭhānesu ‘‘saṅkhepaṭṭhakathāyaṁ pana mahāpaccariyañca vutta’’ntiādinā pārā. aṭṭha.
anya-e0105n21:9_15: Tasmā vajirabuddhiyaṁ cūḷapaccarīti vuttaṭṭhakathā mahāpaccarito uddharitvā saṅkhepena kataṭṭhakathā bhaveyya,
anya-e0105n21:9_16: sā ca saṅkhepena katattā saṅkhepaṭṭhakathā nāma jātā bhaveyya.
anya-e0105n21:9_17: Evañca sati mahāpaccariyā sutāya sāpi sutāyeva hotīti na sā ācariyena sutāti veditabbā.
anya-e0105n21:10_3: saṅghapālādayo therā taṁ visuddhimaggādiganthānaṁ karaṇatthāya visuṁ visuṁ āyāciṁsu.
anya-e0105n21:10_4: Ettha ca ācariyassa yathāvuttaguṇehi sampannabhāvo attano vacaneneva pākaṭo.
anya-e0105n21:12_1: visuddhattheravādīnaṁ desanānayasaṅkhāte sakasamaye ca mahāsaṅghikādimahāyānikapariyosānānaṁ nikāyantarabhūtānaṁ
anya-e0105n21:12_2: paresaṁ piṭakaganthantaravādanayasaṅkhāte parasamaye ca tathā taṁkālikaaññatitthiyasamaṇabrāhmaṇānaṁ
anya-e0105n21:12_4: tesaṁ sakasamayaparasamayānaṁ durogāhadubbodhatthasaṅkhāte gahanaṭṭhānepi ca ogāhituṁ samatthoti dīpeti.
anya-e0105n21:12_5: Paññāveyyattiyasamannāgatoti padena ācariyabuddhaghosatthero porāṇaṭṭhakathāyo saṅkhipituñca paṭisaṅkharituñca samatthoti dīpetīti veditabbo.
